name: skip :ohno: (@skipcloud@inane.chat)
summary:
Currently trying to work out a way to reliably take down our staging environment in work to simulate an incident you would experience on production.

We are working towards Gamedays so people can practise being oncall without actually being thrown into the deep end.

The problem I'm facing today is someone has already accidentally broken the staging environment so I can't intentionally break it ðŸ™ƒ
